name: Cookie Stealth
description:
This is a top-down stealth game made with the Godot game engine. This is experimental, being my first full game made in Godot.

Gameplay

You are a little boy. Your goal is to steal a cookie hidden somewhere (usually a kitchen) and bring it back to your room. Avoid being seen by parents, siblings and classmates. Use various tools in your environment to distract them or to hide. This game plays sort of like hotline miami, minus the blood and guts (sadly).
